import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import useSWR from 'swr' import SelectCategory from '../../graphics/category/SelectCategory' import { getCategories } from '../../../services/api/fetch/getCategories' const AddCategory = props => { const [categoriesList, setCategoriesList] = useState(null) let categories = [] let lvl = 0 const setCategory = (id, value, categoryLvl) => { categories.splice(categoryLvl, 0, id) console.log(value) lvl = categoryLvl + 1 } let content = (
) return content } export default AddCategory
